Speaking in an exclusive interview with ANI, the former envoy said the idea of one NATO country discussing the takeover or purchase of territory belonging to another NATO member was without precedent in modern international relations. "Greenland is part of the Kingdom of Denmark and thereby also part of NATO," Svane said.
